title: Olympic glory: the golden years
creator_credit: Golden Years, Video Sports, Big Fights Olympic Library, James Murray and Denis Phelan
brief_description: This series captures the golden years of Olympic competition where heroes like Dawn Fraser, Betty Cuthbert, Jesse Owens and Mark Spitz became legends of the Olympic spirit. Rare archival footage, narrated by Norman May, makes this a must for sports history lovers.
creator_credit_for_label: Golden Years, Video Sports, Big Fights Olympic Library, James Murray and Denis Phelan
